mapper.select: SELECT O.OT_CAN_APPL_ID , O.APPL_ID , O.OT_APPL_ID , O.WORK_DAY_RESULT_ID , O.YMD , O.TIME_TYPE_CD , O.PLAN_SDATE , O.PLAN_EDATE , O.PLAN_MINUTE , O.APPR_SDATE , O.APPR_EDATE , O.APPR_MINUTE , O.REASON , A.APPL_STATUS_CD FROM WTM_APPL A JOIN WTM_OT_CAN_APPL O ON A.APPL_ID = O.APPL_ID WHERE O.APPL_ID = #{applId}

SELECT A.APPL_ID , A.APPL_CD , A.APPL_STATUS_CD , O.YMD , O.HOLIDAY_YN , O.OT_SDATE , O.OT_EDATE , O.OT_MINUTE , O.REASON_CD , F_WTM_GET_CODE_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, 'REASON_CD', O.REASON_CD, A.APPL_YMD) AS REASON_NM , O.REASON , O.SUB_YN , O.OT_APPL_ID , O.OLD_OT_APPL_ID , O.CANCEL_YN , C.REASON FROM WTM_OT_CAN_APPL C JOIN WTM_APPL A ON C.APPL_ID = A.APPL_ID JOIN WTM_OT_APPL O ON C.OT_APPL_ID = O.OT_APPL_ID WHERE C.APPL_ID = #{applId}
